text: Employees of Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) organised blood donation camps on Sunday in connection with the 68{+t}{+h}birthday of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa. As many as 1,190 employees of TNSTC, Tiruchi Region, donated blood at the camps organised at five locations in the district, a press release here said. Industries and Transport Department Minister P. Thangamani, Khadi and Village Industries Minister T.P. Poonachi visited one of the blood donation camp venue at Punganur and appreciated the employees for donating blood.
title: Blood donation camp
